testcase.name: Verify bionic electric journey
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to bionic energy journey landing page with "https://bdef256b4bd23af1:669ea24b26ea286da0f3803b875642c7@energy-journey-ui-staging.makeiteasy.com".passed When I enter postcode "KT64DU"..............................................passed And I click Start Quote.....................................................passed And I enter "Fredericks" on search field....................................passed And click on the address contains "Fredericks"..............................passed And I enter Business Name "Jeevat LTD"......................................passed And I click Next from business name page....................................passed And I click on Electricity button...........................................passed And I click NO from industry data agreement page............................passed And I click yes option for do you know your MPAN............................passed And I enter MPAN numbere "04" "807" "205" "10" "12863966" "474".............passed And I click Next after entering MPAN........................................passed And I click yes option for electricity supplier.............................passed And I select supplier "British Gas".........................................passed And I select yes option for electricity usage...............................passed And I enter kWh usage "250".................................................passed And I click Next after entering Usage.......................................passed And I click I am not sure option............................................passed And I click Schedule for later (if on chat page)............................passed And I select Time from dropdown.............................................passed And I enter full name "Ravi Ahuja"..........................................passed And I enter email address "test@test.test"..................................passed And I enter phone number "07555555555"......................................passed And I click Schedule call/Finalise Quote button.............................passed Then I navigate to electric lead schedule page..............................passed
